#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,f,d,temp0,sum,temp,ans;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        sum=0;
        scanf("%d %d",&f,&d);
        for(int i=0;i<f;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&temp);
            sum+=temp;
        }
        temp0=d-sum-(f-1)*10;
        if(temp0>=0)
        ans=(d-sum)/5;
        else
            ans=-1;
        printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
